ar: وَيَسْتَعْجِلُونَكَ بِالْعَذَابِ وَلَوْلَا أَجَلٌ مُّسَمًّى لَّجَاءَهُمُ الْعَذَابُ وَلَيَأْتِيَنَّهُم بَغْتَةً وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
en: And they urge you to hasten the punishment. And if not for [the decree of] a specified term, punishment would have reached them. But it will surely come to them suddenly while they perceive not.
They urge you to hasten the punishment.
And indeed,
Hell will be encompassing of the disbelievers
On the Day the punishment will cover them from above them
and from below their feet
and it is said,
"Taste [the result of] what you used to do."
O My servants who have believed,
indeed My earth is spacious,
so worship only Me.
Every soul will taste death.
Every soul will taste death.
Then to Us will you be returned.
And those who have believed
and done righteous deeds
We will surely assign to them
of Paradise [elevated] chambers
chambers beneath which rivers flow,
wherein they abide eternally.
Excellent is the reward of the [righteous] workers
Who have been patient and upon their Lord rely.
Who have been patient and upon their Lord rely.
And how many a creature carries not its [own] provision.
Allah provides for it and for you.
And He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

ar: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَ السَّمَوَتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمْسَ وَالْقَمَرَ لَيَقُولُنَّ اللَّهُ فَأَنَّى يُؤْفَكُونَ
en: If you asked them, "Who created the heavens and earth and subjected the sun and the moon?" they would surely say, "Allāh." Then how are they deluded?

ar: اللَّهُ يَبْسُطُ الرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَاءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ وَيَقْدِرُ لَهُ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
en: Allāh extends provision for whom He wills of His servants and restricts for him. Indeed Allāh is, of all things, Knowing.

ar: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّن نَّزَّلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَحْيَا بِهِ الْأَرْضَ مِن بَعْدِ مَوْتِهَا لَيَقُولُنَّ اللَّهُ قُلِ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
en: And if you asked them, "Who sends down rain from the sky and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness?" they would surely say, "Allāh." Say, "Praise to Allāh"; but most of them do not reason.

ar: وَمَا هَذِهِ الْحَيَوةُ الدُّنْيَا إِلَّا لَهْوٌ وَلَعِبٌ وَإِنَّ الدَّارَ الْءَاخِرَةَ لَهِىَ الْحَيَوَانُ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ
en: And this worldly life is not but diversion and amusement. And indeed, the home of the Hereafter - that is the [eternal] life, if only they knew.
